img_text: Former Grad Student Accuses Neil De Grasse Tyson Of Rape Tchiya Amet says the professor drugged her and demanded sex back in 1984. By EMILY ZANOTT October 30, 2017 A woman who attended grad school with Neil deGrasse Tyson says the now-famous astrophysicist drugged and raped her at the University of Texas back in 1984. Tchiya Amet tweeted her allegations as part of the "#MeToo" campaign-a social media-based effort to help women reveal incidents of sexual harassment,sxual abuse, and rape in their past. Amet made the same claims in 2014 and again in 2016, and resurfaced a blog post from 2014 as part of the effort.
